$(c:/ftbquests open_book 60D44B70BB06539B)&c$(l)---> Open Quest Page <--- $(/c)$(br)&r&eGear Soul Extractors&r can be used on gear. You will get the 'stats' of the gear back as a soul, destroying the base item in the process. You can then use the soul on another piece of gear!

Conversely, &eGear Soul Cleaners&r are used to get rid of the stats of the gear while keeping the base item.

&eGem Extractors&r are used to remove &eGems&r from your socketed gear. There is no penalty for doing so, but the extractor will be consumed. There is also a &eRune Extractor&r, but using that will cost &e1 Gear Potential&r.
